A starting test

```{r}
library(leaflet)
pal <- colorQuantile("YlOrRd", NULL, n = 8)
orstationc <- read.csv('inputs/orstationc.csv')
leaflet(orstationc) %>% 
		addTiles() %>%
		addCircleMarkers(color = ~pal(tann))
```
